item.title: How to get through an Data Analyst/Scientist Interview Part 1
item.description: When I was a teenager I was very bad at studying, in high school there was not a year where I did not go to summer school and in general the habit of studying annoyed me. But years later, when I entered college, I realized that it wasn’t that I hated studying, I hated what I believed back then to be studying. I used to think that studying was sitting down and reading the book or the summaries that I have written on the subject thousands of times.
